alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 6:25PM CDT until September 05 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mitchell County in western Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Colorado City State Park, or 11 miles southwest of Colorado City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Colorado City State Park, Lake Colorado City, and Westbrook. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 198 and 211. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
